summary: Dead by Daylight companion app with separate sections (Characters/Perks database, Build planner, Match tracker, News hub, Fan wiki) and user accounts, using an internal/placeholder dataset (no external REST API).
architectural_notes: No external REST API; use built-in/placeholder dataset that can be replaced/updated later.
App organized into separate sections: Characters, Perks, Builds, Match Tracker, News, Wiki.
User authentication via Internet Identity; user-specific persistence for builds, match history, and favorites.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- App logo mark with a dark horror aesthetic (dbd-companion-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide subtle grunge/fog background texture, dark and low-contrast (dbd-companion-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Create a multi-section frontend with separate navigable sections: Characters, Perks, Build Planner, Match Tracker, News, and Wiki (not a single combined page).
Add Internet Identity authentication to the app so users can sign in/out and the UI reflects the authenticated state.
Build the Characters & Perks database UI: list + detail views, with search/filter/sort controls, and the ability for signed-in users to favorite items.
Implement a Build Planner section that lets signed-in users create, edit, delete, and save custom builds (e.g., role/type selection and perk loadout), and browse their saved builds.
Implement a Match Tracker section that lets signed-in users record match results and view their match history.
Add News and Wiki sections that display content from the internal dataset with list + detail views and basic search.
Add a user profile area that summarizes the signed-in userâ€™s saved builds, favorites, and recent matches, with quick links to manage them.

Apply a coherent, distinct visual theme for a Dead by Daylight companion app (typography, color palette, layout, components) and enforce it consistently across all sections. Avoid blue/purple as primary branding colors.
Generate and include a small set of custom static images for the app (logo and subtle background) and render them from the frontend as static assets.

new_feature_requests.summary: Separate sections for Characters & Perks database
Build planner with ability to create/save custom builds
Match tracker with ability to save match history per user
News hub section for Dead by Daylight updates
Fan wiki section for Dead by Daylight content
User accounts (Internet Identity) with saved favorites/builds/match history
Built-in/placeholder dataset storage instead of external REST API
Implement backend support for per-user data keyed by Internet Identity principal, including: saved builds, match history, and favorites (e.g., favorite characters/perks/builds).

Provide a built-in (internal/placeholder) dataset for Dead by Daylight content instead of integrating an external REST API, and expose it through backend query methods for Characters, Perks, News items, and Wiki entries.

projectName: Dead by Daylight companion app with Internet Identity, multi-section UI, and per-user saved data
